TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmpBitmapDecoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder
Public NotInheritable Class WmpBitmapDecoder Inherits BitmapDecoder

summary.span: Defines a decoder for Microsoft Windows Media Photo encoded images.

span.span: Defines a decoder for Microsoft Windows Media Photo encoded images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是新的轉碼器，提供更好的映像精確度，比使用較小的檔案大小的 JPEG 和更多功能。 is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than JPEG with smaller file sizes and more features. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像會使用單一演算法，以達到失真和不失真壓縮。 images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支援現有中繼資料的標準。 images support existing metadata standards. 如需此格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Media Photo 規格](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。For additional information about this format, see the [Windows Media Photo Specification](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of from the specified file stream with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用快取選項，如果您想要關閉`bitmapStream`建立解碼器之後。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. 預設值快取選項保留資料流的存取權，直到需要點陣圖，並清除作業由記憶體回收行程。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體，並使用從檔案資料流。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of and use a from a file stream. 已解碼的映像做為來源的控制項。The decoded image is used as the source of an control. [!code-cpp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/WDPEncoderDecoder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/WDPEncoderDecoder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/WDPEncoderDecoder.vb#1)]

exception.span: The is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] encoded image.

span.span: The is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] encoded image.
